data.name: Astraverse
data.detailed_description:
Astraverse is an Action RPG Beat' em-up for up to 4 players that's set in a sci-fi "phantasy" universe! Create your own character, choose your character's backstory and embark on a quest alone or with your friends on an adventure across 5 different planets where your choices can affect the paths that you take as well as your own character's story!


Register yourself as a Seeker, an interplanetary sword-for-hire that works to assist and protect the people of the Ze're Star System. Featuring the most detailed character creation system in any 2D action RPG in existence! Choose your class, race, outfit, hair, hair color, eyes, and more!



As a Seeker, venture out to different planets across the Ze're system and discover the secrets of universe!



Explore each planet in beautiful hand-drawn environments! Fight against the Parablights to protect the star system in an action battle system reminiscent of classic beat 'em ups!



Choose your own adventure through immersive text-based encounters that can alter your quest based on your choices!



Enjoy a uniquely immersive adventure either solo or in a party of up to 4!

data.short_description: Create your own character, choose your own story and explore 5 different planets in a sci-fi "phantasy" beat 'em up RPG for up to 4-players!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3000 Series processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Vega 3 Discrete Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during development
